title: Is Kanye West losing his popularity after his comments about slavery and reversing his temporary support for Trump? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think he will always be popular. He is a talented musician. Although I think fame has gotten to his head. One thing is that Kanye West is mentally ill. I believe he has Bipolar disorder. He has been hospitalized for this. He says some crazy things due to his disorder. He needs treatment. I pity him. I don't hate him.
